name: The Bureau Of Small Projects
tagline: Big Brand Experience For Small Business
description:
20 years of experience with Fortune 500 Companies and Major Brands.
We use all our “trade-secrets” developed over the years working with BIG companies with deep pockets to help SMALL Businesses, Startups and Non-Profits take their organization to the next level.
---
Strengths include: Brand Development and Strategy, Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Website Design, Custom Wordpress Development and Speed Optimization.
---
Also, so you get where we're coming from, as a side project, David Gaz, our Creative Director, recently directed the feature documentary Kindness Is Contagious, narrated by Catherine Ryan Hyde, author of the bestselling book (and film) Pay It Forward. It changed his life. While filming, our team worked with many non-profits and small businesses that were making an impact and we realized that the marketing tools we had been developing could be repurposed to help non-profits increase donations and small businesses increase sales.
---
Lastly, David Gaz writes about Branding for Forbes Magazine, has spoken at Stanford University, The Centre Georges Pompidou in Paris and at events all across the country.
